Retrieving even a basic web page from a web server and recording it with the 
simple data writer fails. The data writer ceases writing results on the line 
containing a 0xB7 character.
For example, retrieving the page:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">

<html>
<head>
	<title>Crash Test Dummy</title>
</head>

<body>
crash char·crashed now
</body>
</html>
will result in the simple data writer recording
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<testResults>

<sampleResult threadName="Main Loop - just because we need one 1-1" 
responseMessage="OK" timeStamp="1107762847037" dataType="text" label="crash 
test" responseCode="200" time="271" success="true"><property name="samplerData" 
xml:space="preserve">GET http://***SERVER_AT_MY_WORK***/crashtestdummy.html
</property><binary><!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 
Transitional//EN">

<html>
<head>
	<title>Crash Test Dummy</title>
</head>

<body>
crash char</binary></sampleResult>
</testResults>
